name: Ad-Hoc.tv
description:
"Welcome to Ad-Hoc.TV Premier website for viewing Japanese anims and cartoons featuring Boy And Dog. Broswe our many selction of SHOWS and GAMES! You must disable adblock to view video."

Can you navigate your way through out of control popup adverts to watch the latest episode of your favourite show? You've had a busy shift and want to unwind with Mystical Bartend Ex-treme glitter fight! but its only released in Japan and your solution lies in getting past all the ads. Find the [x] on each ad to close it.
